title: enda vidam
sahitya:
enda vidam unranaruL vandiDumaiyE enakk-


anupallavi

  santatamum unranaDi cintanai sheyyAdavenak-


caraNam    manamata kariyai venru malaraDiyil nilai ninru unadu perumai pugazhndu ulaga
 sukhamadai nondu ninaivinoDu kanavilum nin nAmam maravAda
anagha guaNa dhIrark-kalAdu anbilAdavenakk-
